name: Eternal Adventure (Genericide)
description:
Build your character, travel your world, and experience your story! Eternal Adventure is a procedural, turn-based RPG with an emphasis on player choice. Do you enjoy customizing your own party of heroes? Tackling problems both in and out of combat the way you want? Finding different areas and challenges every playthrough? Insulting people's hats?  If you answered yes to any of these questions, Eternal Adventure is the game for you!

Controls:

Movement - Arrow Keys/Mouse

Select - Z/Left-Click

Cancel/Menu - X/Right-Click
